title: 2005 anime logo
content:
tried WTF and WFI but nothing close.  
Any help is much appreciated.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828213807im_/http:/typophile.com/files/4_5557.jpg)

author: akovia

comments.content: It could be an emboldened, expanded and heavily slanted **[Shelley Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20140828213807/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Adobe&ffam=Shelley%20Script%20LT%20Std%20-%20Regular&fid=4484d8ef2fbe04babfadc92562e1e571&fstyle=b&fsize=60&text=Pure&fit=1)** available from Adobe, Linotype, Monotype & Bitstream.
